attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the European Union now decides at least 65% of our British law why do we still have 600+ MP's in the British Parliament?

Therefore I petition that the British Parliament's MP's should be reduced by at least 65% and the reduced costs should be given back to the British people by way of reduced taxation.

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call to action, not your email address. However, there is already a petition on this issue http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FewerMPs/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
